PRODUCTS

Uncover our collection of the finest rice that entails essential nutrition and flavour. Sona Cereal brings you handpicked and carefully processed premium-quality rice that will transform your dining experience. Our team guarantees excellence, texture, and consistency in every grain. From fragrant basmati to 100% broken rice and pesticide-free rice, we offer unparalleled quality for every recipe.

Our Customised Services

At Sona Cereal, our experts understand the importance of branding and customization in a current competitive marketplace. Our customized packaging solutions cater to your private labelling needs. From flexible pack sizes ranging between 500 gm to 20kg and more, we ensure your rice products are exhibited in a remarkable way that aligns with your brand identity and value. We serve clients coming from across the globe with different packaging and documentation needs. We assign them a point of contact who takes good care of customers’ requirements and provides support.

Presence

With more than 70 leading distributors across India, Sona Cereal Products Pvt. Ltd. is recognized as a trusted rice supplier nationwide. We have successfully reached various countries, including Saudi Arabia, UAE, Kuwait, Iran, and Oman, through effective techniques and diligence. 

At Sona Cereal, our team is committed to sustainability in business practices, and our environmentally friendly plant stands as a testament to our dedication to our planet.
